page.title: 09BUSES, KINGSTON
page.content: A bus stop is where people wait for a bus. At a "request"bus stop you have to put your hand to let the driver know you want to get on his bus. The number 65 bus goes along the Richmond Road. It comes all the way from Chessington and goes to Ealing. The buses come along about every 10 minutes. The maximum fare is 30p. For a short distance the minimum fare is 25p. Children pay half and old age pensioners travel free. Our buses are part of{London Transport. }Some double deckers, which have 72 seats and some are single deckers. Pay-as-you-enter buses have front entrance doors and middle exit doors. Most buses are red but the country buses are green. There are advertisements inside and outside the buses. The garage for Kingston is at Norbiton. 3 people bus to school.
